text: Brrda phu thi thuk khab lixxk cak banreuxn khxng phwk khea doy prascak khwam yutithrrm nxkcak phwk khea klaw wa xallxhˌ khux phracea khxng rea theanan læa ha kwa xallxhˌ thrng khadkhwang mi hı mnusʹy txsu sung kanlæakan læw brrda hx swd læa bosth (khxng phwk khrist) læa sthan thi swd (khxng phwk yiw) læa masyid thanghlay thi phranam khx ngxallxhˌ thuk klaw raluk xyang makmay txng thuk thalay xyang nænxn læa næ nx nxallxhˌ ca thrng chwyhelux phu thi snabsnun sasna khxng phraxngkh thæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng phlang phuthrng dechanuphaph xyang thæcring
